00162 long Binomial::operator( )( unsigned n, double p )
00163 {
00164     long s = 0;
00165 
00166     while( n-- ) 
00167         s += long( rng( ) + p );
00168 
00169     return s;
00170 }

00258 //========================================================================
00288 double Binomial::p( const unsigned n, const double p, const unsigned x ) const
00289 {
00290   unsigned ii;
00291   double prob;
00292   double q = 1 - p; // faster for large n
00293 
00294   prob = static_cast<double>(Binomial::binominalCoefficient( n , x ));
00295 
00296   // p^x:
00297   for (ii = 0; ii < x; ii++){
00298     prob *= p;
00299   }
00300 
00301   // q^(n-x):
00302   for (ii = x; ii < n; ii++){
00303     prob *= q;
00304   }
00305 
00306   return prob;
00307 }
00308 
00309 
00310 //========================================================================
00336 unsigned Binomial::binominalCoefficient( const unsigned n, const unsigned x ) const
00337 {
00338   unsigned result;
00339   result = factorial( n );
00340   result /= ( factorial( x ) * factorial( n - x ) );
00341   return result;
00342 }
00343 
00344 
00345 //========================================================================
00369 unsigned Binomial::factorial( const unsigned tt ) const
00370 {
00371   unsigned result = 1;
00372   for (unsigned ii = 2; ii <= tt; ii++){
00373     result *= ii;
00374   }
00375   return result;
00376 }
